title: Bo Bo Bokura wa Shounen Kaitoudan
original_name: ぼっぼっ僕らは少年怪盗団
sinopse: Moboroshi moves from Hokkaido to Tokyo and the first thing he encountered on his first day at school is an incidents from a group of mysterious thief. At school, Moboroshi shows athletics skill to his class and is soon becomes a member of that mysterious group at the time he needs help.
